titles: By the Mayor. Whereas by an ancient law and statute of this realm, it is provided, that no fairs or markets be kept in church-yards ...
author: City of London (England). Lord Mayor.
Frederick, John, Sir, fl. 1661-1662.
publisher: Printed by James Flesher, Printer to the honourable city of London,
notes: Title from caption and first lines of text.
Place and date of publication suggested by text.
Dated at end: Given at Guild-hall London, the 22 day of November, in the said thirteenth year of his Majesties reign.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Markets --  Law and legislation --  England --  London --  Early works to 1800.
